<title level="1" pfs="">[Miner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3494)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Miners explore deep underground in search of minerals and rare ores, taking numerous precautions to keep themselves safe.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Miner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3494)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 68

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +3, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +6, [Mining Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +4, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Hammer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=24), [Lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=29), miner's harness (functions as [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=41)), [Pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34), [Piton](/Equipment.aspx?ID=39) (5), [Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) (100 feet)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pick +6 ([fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Piton Pin** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) **Requirements** The miner has their hammer in hand; **Effect** The miner Interacts to draw a piton, then hammers it into a creature to pin them in place, attempting an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check against the target's Reflex DC. On a hit, the target is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81) until it removes the piton with a successful DC 10 Athletics check made as an Interact action.

</column>
